author: iSazonov
body:
Closed #3145 
> We need lists of approved aliases and tests to verify the approved aliases exist in PowerShell.

comments.author: iSazonov
comments.body:
Question about original tests (first Describe in the file): it looks as non-actual - should we fix it or remove at all?

And I include check only for Microsoft.PowerShell.Utility and Microsoft.PowerShell.Management modules.
What modules else should we check?

title: Add test to verify approved aliases list
